im-stupid.title: "I'm Stupid"
im-stupid.description: Your 7-year-old has been doing math homework for over an hour. She just slammed the book shut and shoved it off the table.
im-stupid.opening_line: I can't do this. I can't do maths, I'm so stupid! This is so tought!
im-stupid.opening_line_hindi: Mujhse ye nahi ho raha, mai maths nahi kar sakti, mai bohot stupid hoon, ye bohot tough hai.
im-stupid.opening_inner_feeling: I've been trying for an hour and I still can't get them right. Something must be wrong with me.

toy-store.title: Toy Store Meltdown
toy-store.description: You're in a toy store. Your 5-year-old has spotted an expensive toy and is starting to lose it. Other parents are watching.
toy-store.opening_line: I WANT IT! I WANT THE BIG ROBOT! PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE! You NEVER buy me anything!
toy-store.opening_line_hindi: Mujhe chahiye! Mujhe bada wala robot chahiye! Please please please! Aap mujhe kabhi kuch nahi dilaate!
toy-store.opening_inner_feeling: I really really want it and I'm scared Papa will say no like always.

i-hate-you.title: "I HATE YOU"
i-hate-you.description: Your 6-year-old just found out they can't go to their best friend's birthday party because of a family commitment.
i-hate-you.opening_line: I HATE YOU! You're the WORST parent EVER! You RUIN everything! I wish I had a DIFFERENT family!
i-hate-you.opening_line_hindi: Mujhe aapse nafrat hai! Aap sabse bure parent ho! Aap sab barbaad kar dete ho! Kaash meri koi aur family hoti!
i-hate-you.opening_inner_feeling: My heart is breaking and I feel like nobody cares about what matters to me.

the-lie.title: The Lie
the-lie.description: You've found hidden chocolate wrappers under your 7-year-old's bed. They told you they didn't eat any sweets today.
the-lie.opening_line: I... I didn't... I don't know how those got there. Maybe someone else put them there.
the-lie.opening_line_hindi: Maine... maine nahi... mujhe nahi pata wo wahaan kaise aa gaye. Shayad kisi aur ne rakhe honge.
the-lie.opening_inner_feeling: My stomach hurts because I know I did it and I'm terrified of getting in trouble.
